General.Name: Shanghai Kai Kai Industry Co Ltd A
General.Description: Shanghai Kai Kai Industry Company Limited engages in the production, wholesale, and retail of shirts, t-shirts, and sweaters, and Chinese and Western medicines in China. It operates through Pharmaceutical and Apparel segments. The pharmaceutical segment engages in the wholesale and retail of traditional Chinese and Western patent medicines; the traditional Chinese medicine pharmaceutical service under the Lei Yunshang brand; and the sales of high-end tonics under the Shang Lei brand, as well as produces Chinese patent medicine preparations under the Jing and Que brands. The Apparel segment offers shirts, t-shirts, silk women's clothing, and sweaters under the Kai Kai brand. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
